thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Near to many attractions
thread.title_full: Near to many attractions - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Annette L
title: Near to many attractions
text:
This hotel is easy to reach by bus, underground or car. The location is super when you explore the parts of London like Downing street, Piccadilly circus, West End and a short walk to Oxford street. The staff at the hotel were very helpful and James who helped us, could even speak Swedish. I can really recommend this hotel.
Room Tip: I have stayed at this hotel twice and got a good room each time. See more room tips
